AboutMe.Heading: About Me
AboutMe.Introduce_1:

I have hands-on experience in developing Fullstack web applications for various organizations, ranging from educational institutions to medical facilities. The systems I have built are currently used by thousands of users.

AboutMe.Introduce_2: I am interested in pursuing a degree in Engineering at the university level. I believe this field aligns with both global future needs and my personal aspiration to create innovations, inventions, and technologies that help develop society and support long-term sustainability.
